result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk Cheree
Cases 16FO254, 16CF629, 15CM1822, 15CM188, 15CF1200, 15CF1061, 16CF109, 15CM2251, 15CM2041 called: 4:05pm
State appears by ADA C.Minder.  Def appears in person and with Atty Peter Rotter.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State moves to Amend Information in 1061 - COURT Grants and accepts Amended Information
State moves to:
16FO254>>D&RI
15CF1200 - Cts. 1, 3, 4, and 5>>all D&RI
15CF1061 - Ct. 2 >>D&RI
16CF109 - Cts 3-7>>D&RI
15CM1822>>D&RI entire file
15CM1880>>D&RI entire file
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
16CF629 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>GUILTY
15CF1200 - Ct. 2 (OWI 2nd)>>GUILTY
15CF1061 - Ct. 1 (Misd Battery)>>NO CONTEST
16CF109 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>GUILTY
16CF109 - Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>GUILTY
15CM2251 - Ct. 1 (Obstructing)>>GUILTY
15CM2251 - Ct. 2 (Poss THC)>>GUILTY
15CM2041 - Ct. 1 (Obstructing)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS:
15CF1200 >> $1605 inclusive; 85 days MCJ w/credit for 64 days of time already served; 15 months DL Rev w/credit; AODA and any follow up recommended; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant him/herself, both for a period of 15 months; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid.

On all Misd Counts>>Sentence Wheld; 2 Years Probation, on each count.
On all Felony Counts>>Sentence Wheld; 5 years Probation, on each count.
>>All Probation to run concurrent to each other.
CONDITIONS: 15CF601 - Ct. 1 only>>120 days MCJ with huber if defendant qualifies under jail classification system, w/credit for 48 days of time already served, to begin at the end of the OWI sentence 15CF1200.
CONDITIONS on all probation counts: SAFE program completion; Absolute Sobriety; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C with victims in 15CF1061 S.M.S. or N.F. unless approved by PO; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or a combination thereof, or for any time he does not meet that requirement, defendant must perform 10 hours of C.S./week; CC; DNA sample and surcharges.

>>COURT ORDERS upon successful completion of 5 years probation, 16CF109 and 16CF629 are to be expunged.

Adj: 4:38pm
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Plea set
